EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your application to The Challenge - here are your next steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
CONDITIONAL ACCEPTANCE
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} and the Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for beginning your application to secure a place for {!Contact.FirstName} on The Challenge, the largest provider of the National Citizen Service. {!Contact.FirstName} has nearly completed their application for a place on the programme!
To avoid {!Contact.FirstName} missing out on this opportunity, we have temporarily reserved a place for two weeks only in order for you to complete the application. After this time, the space may be given to another applicant.
All we need in order to finish processing {!Contact.FirstName}’s place is:
{!Contact.CAL_Missing_Items_Criteria_Paragraph__c} Call us: 020 3542 2400 / Email us: contact@the-challenge.org / Log into our website at: www.the-challenge.org
Please provide the above within two weeks. Once we have received this, we will be able to continue processing {!Contact.FirstName}’s application.
If you have any questions, or think you will be unable to complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application within two weeks, please do get in touch with us as soon as possible so that we can assist you.
If you can't remember your password, you can recover it here: https://bookings.the-challenge.org/login-password.php
We are delighted that {!Contact.FirstName} has decided to sign up for The Challenge. As places are filling up very rapidly across the country, we would urge {!Contact.FirstName} to remind their friends to take part in this unique and exciting opportunity.
Yours sincerely,
Rebecca Carter Director at The Challenge Network
the-challenge.org ncsyes.co.uk /thechallengenetwork /ncs
